title: How to Mod on CoD 5 Wii

steps.headline: Start out as the imperial army.
steps.description: It doesn’t matter what weapon you have, as long as you have satchel charges to kill people.

steps.headline: Go up the barred window in the nearest bunker (the one nearest the big rock).
Jump and crouch in mid-air while running towards the window.
If it worked, you should have gone through, so turn around.
steps.description: If you see a window from the other side, you succeeded!

steps.headline: Now throw a satchel charge through the window near the door.
Walk up to the door in the bunker.
steps.description: You can see if somebody’s coming through the door!

steps.headline: Act fast, soldier!
steps.description: Blow the charge! No weapons need for this. However, it is good for sniping.

steps.headline: Start as the imperial army.
steps.description: Turn around and go to the long building at the end of the map. Go up the steps and in front of the window. Walk towards the pole holding up the overhang. press jump and A.

steps.headline: If it worked, you’re on top of the pole.
steps.description: Move back a tad. not too far or you fall off. now run and jump. the good sign is if you’re stuck.

steps.headline: Jump and start moving.
steps.description: Good, now you’re under the roof. perfect for sniping without being found.

steps.headline: Go to the other side of the building so your head starts sticking out the side.
steps.description: Move towards the tree. If you have done it correctly, you will fall through it but not through the ground. Slowly edge around the tree. Now move through the brush. Get to the side of a house. jump on the side

steps.headline: If you did it right, you’re on elevated ground.
steps.description: Now move along the edge of the house. Keep moving around the corner. Don't worry if you fall off. Just go the one empty space right below the one corridor that goes to the intersection, left going to Sniper tower.

steps.headline: Now keep moving along the edge until the ledge stops.
steps.description: walk up the hill. Don't worry you're safe now. Off the map but no places to fall through. Now go down the hill until you see a house with a window. Jump & crouch combo through the window. You’re invincible for everything. This is the only safe place in all the COD 5 maps where you can’t be hurt by anything. Now people can’t kill you.

text: Start out as the imperial army. It doesn’t matter what weapon you have, as long as you have satchel charges to kill people. Go up the barred window in the nearest bunker (the one nearest the big rock).  Jump and crouch in mid-air while running towards the window.  If it worked, you should have gone through, so turn around. If you see a window from the other side, you succeeded! Now throw a satchel charge through the window near the door.  Walk up to the door in the bunker. You can see if somebody’s coming through the door! Act fast, soldier! Blow the charge! No weapons need for this. However, it is good for sniping. Start as the imperial army. Turn around and go to the long building at the end of the map. Go up the steps and in front of the window. Walk towards the pole holding up the overhang. press jump and A. If it worked, you’re on top of the pole. Move back a tad. not too far or you fall off. now run and jump. the good sign is if you’re stuck. Jump and start moving. Good, now you’re under the roof. perfect for sniping without being found. Go to the other side of the building so your head starts sticking out the side. Move towards the tree. If you have done it correctly, you will fall through it but not through the ground. Slowly edge around the tree. Now move through the brush. Get to the side of a house. jump on the side If you did it right, you’re on elevated ground. Now move along the edge of the house. Keep moving around the corner. Don't worry if you fall off. Just go the one empty space right below the one corridor that goes to the intersection, left going to Sniper tower. Now keep moving along the edge until the ledge stops. walk up the hill. Don't worry you're safe now. Off the map but no places to fall through. Now go down the hill until you see a house with a window. Jump & crouch combo through the window. You’re invincible for everything. This is the only safe place in all the COD 5 maps where you can’t be hurt by anything. Now people can’t kill you.
